Collar_Explosion.help: The explosion has left you Disoriented.
Collar_Explosion.targetHelp: The explosion has left you Disoriented.

Hurl_Boulder.help: This foe can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Jab.help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Ghoulish_Inspiration.help: While the Ghoul Manslayer is not held he will boost the damage, chance to hit and resistance to status effects of nearby allies.
Ghoulish_Inspiration.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +DMG, +To Hit, Res(Immobilize, Sleep, Confuse, Hold, Disorient)
Ghoulish_Inspiration.targetHelp: While the Ghoul Manslayer is not held he will boost the damage, chance to hit and resistance to status effects of nearby allies.
Ghoulish_Inspiration.targetShortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +DMG, +To Hit, Res(Immobilize, Sleep, Confuse, Hold, Disorient)

Flurry_of_Fists.help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of punches to pummel your foe. Flurry is so dizzying that it has a chance to Disorient the target.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Marked_for_Death.help: Ghouls operate in pacts and it is the Painted One's duty to "mark" their prey. Being marked will cause some minor Toxic damage and cause nearby enemies to be more likely to attack you.
Marked_for_Death.targetHelp: You've been marked, nearby foes may be attracted to you.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} marks you causing nearby enemies to be more likely to attack you.

Throw.help: Ghouls often throw nearby objects at their foes before they close in melee and tear them apart. This attack does moderate smashing damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Plasma_Smasher.help: The GhoulX soldier's plasma gauntlet is capable of delivering punishing blows as well as disorienting its foes.
Plasma_Smasher.targetHelp: The GhoulX soldier's plasma gauntlet is capable of delivering punishing blows as well as disorienting its foes.

Plasma_Blast.help: The GhoulX soldier's gauntlets are capable of firing potent plasma energy attacks at their foes which strike with enough force to sometimes knock a foe off their feet.
Plasma_Blast.targetHelp: The GhoulX soldier's gauntlets are capable of firing potent plasma energy attacks at their foes which strike with enough force to sometimes knock a foe off their feet.

Plasma_Spray.help: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.shortHelp: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown
Plasma_Spray.targetHelp: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.targetShortHelp: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown

Resistance.help: This power grants the Ghoul some minor resistance to Lethal and Smashing damage.

Death_and_Glory.help: Once the Ghoul dies, he will heal nearby allies for a small amount of HP, this power will not always work.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points.

Resistance.help: This power grants the Ghoul some minor resistance to Lethal and Smashing damage.

Death_and_Glory.help: Once the Ghoul dies, he will heal nearby allies for a small amount of HP, this power will not always work.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points.

Resistance.help: This power grants the Ghoul some minor resistance to Lethal and Smashing damage.

Death_and_Glory.help: Once the Ghoul dies, he will heal nearby allies for a small amount of HP, this power will not always work.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points.

Resistance.help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Resistance.targetHelp: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Deflection.help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast
Deflection.attackerHit: You engage {PowerName} increasing your melee defense as well as your lethal and smashing resistance.

Against_All_Odds.help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Slow
Against_All_Odds.attackerHit: You are ready for the worst, you gain a damage bonus for each foe you engage in melee.

Heavy_Pulse_Blast.help: The Heavy Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.
Heavy_Pulse_Blast.targetHelp: The {PowerName} has reduced your resistance to all damage types except psionics.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Pulse_Blast.help: The Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.

Resistance.help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Resistance.targetHelp: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Fast_Healing.help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Dull_Pain.help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Hack.help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hack.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Slash.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Integration.help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Recharge: Fast
Integration.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration
Integration.attackerHit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.
